response.overview: As the Bible says, “Money is the root of all evils”. The movie revolves around how some of the supposedly hard-earned money found its way to the hands of a loving father, his son, vendors, a suitor, street gang, a mob, and the mob-boss based in California USA who nailed the coffin culminating to the surprised ending scene. The actors and interpretative dances are from the hip hop group Lazarus based in Cavite.
response.title: MGA (Money Goes Around)
